data.title: al-qur'an in English - Javanese-English Dictionary
data.meta_description: Check 'al-qur'an' translations into English. Look through examples of al-qur'an translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar.
data.text:
Translation of "al-qur'an" into English

quran, Koran, Qur'an are the top translations of "al-qur'an" into English. Sample translated sentence: Nyai Ahmad Dahlan maca Al Qur'an ing naskah Jawi. ↔ The Quran contains teachings from sacred scripture.

al-qur'an

Show algorithmically generated translations

Automatic translations of "al-qur'an" into English

Glosbe Translate

Translations with alternative spelling

Al-Qur'an

Phrases similar to "al-qur'an" with translations into English

Jan Jeffcoat · Qur'an

Add example Add

Translations of "al-qur'an" into English in sentences, translation memory

Nyai Ahmad Dahlan maca Al Qur'an ing naskah Jawi.

The Quran contains teachings from sacred scripture.

Surat An Nahl (Arab سورة النحل) iku surat kaping 16 Al-Qur’an.

Starting on the 3rd row he took the lead on lap 16 to the flag.

Masjid asli wujud yasan kabuka kanthi mimbar kanggo maca Al-Qur’an.

The mouthparts of H. suis are contained in the labrum, with teeth at the tip.

Surat Maryam (Arab سورة مريم) iku surat kaping 19 Al-Qur’an.

He was raised by his mother Maria, whom he used to call Maria Benedetta (the blessed Mary).

Surat Al-Insan (Arab: الْاٍنسان , "Manungsa") iku surat angka 76 sajeroning al-Qur'an.

A Letter of Prayer (A Pistle of Prayer), which survives in seven manuscripts.

Ing Al-Qur'an, nabi iki uga ana lan diarani Zulkifli.

That indeed were an unfair division!

Surah Al-Lahab utawa Al-Masad iku surat angka 111 sajeroning Al-Qur'an.

The Surah is so designated after the word al-bayyinah occurring at the end of the first verse.

Surat Nuh (basa Arab:نوح, "Nuh") ya iku surat kaping 71 ing sajeroning al-Qur'an.

In Nuh, the seventy-first surah, the Quran refers to Nuh’s prophethood in snippets.

Surat Al ‘Ankabuut (basa Arab:العنكبوت) iku surat kaping 29 Al-Qur’an.

The opening verses of Surat Al-Ankabut (chapter 29: The Spider) were revealed in response to this tragic event.

Ing sajeroning Al-Qur'an, kitab suci umat Selam, wiyosané Gusti Yesus utawa Nabi Isa uga kaserat ing Sura kaping 19, Surat Maryam.

The Number of Verse and Sura together in the Qur'an which announces Jesus son of Maryam's (Mary's) birth (Qur'an 19:19).

Ing Al-Qur'an digambarke yèn Kaum Tsamud iku kaum kang kuwasa sawisé Kaum 'Ad, kang misuwur minangka tukang ukir bukit kanggo omah.

The well of the Thamudians which is mentioned in the Holy Quran is located in the middle of the mountains. — Al-Istakhri.

Ing surat al-Qadr diandharake yèn nalika pisanan mudhune al-Qur'an ya iku nalika wengi Lailatul Qadr lan uga diandharake dhuwure derajat wengi iki.

There are many inscriptions on idols, most of them are not clear due to deterioration with time.

Kiyamat punika sampun dipunmangertosi utamanipun saking Qur'an Surat Al-Qori'ah.

The word has its roots in the word śrāvana, i.e. the one who listens (the discourses of the saints).
